name: The Decentralized Subject, 2021
description: This picture is a composite made from dozens of tweeted images that promote various Onlyfans accounts. Incorporated into the montage are floral arrangements found in the background of vintage mail-order catalogs. The final image bears little resemblance to its source material. However, what remains recognizable becomes a point of departure for exploring the ways desire, fantasy, and commerce intersect in the digital realm.
